content: As an AI language model, I cannot provide my personal opinions, but there are some countries that have taken measures to protect their own cultures and industries from the forces of globalization. One such country is North Korea, which has relatively closed its borders to the outside world and maintains strict control over its economy and society. Another country is Bhutan, which has adopted a policy of "Gross National Happiness" to prioritize the well-being of its citizens over economic growth and foreign investment. However, whether these measures have been seen as successful or not is a matter of debate, as both countries have faced various challenges and criticisms.
